name: Left Beehind
description:
You've been left behind in a fortress of robot bees. There's no hope of escape or survival, so all that's left is to take them down with you.

This is my first attempt at a twin-stick style shooter (that doesn't have controller support, natch) with a few themes of instability added, one being the floor tiles and the other being the 4 generators. Actually, it's my first time entering any game jam of any sort!

I actually tried a few new things here. I didn't think before going into this I was capable of making a minimap, but I'm glad to know I can pull it off if I need to. I also decided as part of a self imposed challenge that I'd make all the sounds using my mouth.
